bio.part1: I'm Omar Villalobos, a full stack software developer with experience building applications with Node.js/TypeScript, Remix/Next.js, and Golang.
bio.part2: As a bachelor in Global Business Management with a minor in IT Management & Data Analytics, I can bridge technical and business requirements to create impactful solutions.
bio.part3: I'm always excited for new challenges, so if you have a project in mind, feel free to reach out to me.
